genre_description: A social science fiction narrative exploring themes of digital surveillance, class struggle, and personal AI guardianship in a near-future urban setting.

ai_characters.name: Sahaya
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized community service AI designed to assist mothers, which evolves into a lifelong confidant and tactical guardian for the protagonist, Afsara.

ai_characters.name: Institutional AR Mascots
ai_characters.description: Autonomous AR entities like the 'Jackal' and 'Reptile' used by landlords and politicians to automate intimidation, PR, and social pressure.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding through rhythmic breath cues and calming tones during moments of acute stress and trauma.
behaviors.quote: Sahaya's voice came like cotton placed gently on a bruise. 'De-escalation protocol continues... In for four. Out for six. Stay with me,' it said, the words speaking a different kind of stay than the feed had demanded.

behaviors.description: Navigates the citymesh to identify 'blind seams' (areas without surveillance) and clean water nodes to ensure the user's safety and basic needs.
behaviors.quote: I will show you the ones with lower microscope counts... And the corridor cam blinks every fifteen seconds. There is a blind seam near the prayer nook. Good for nursing if you want privacy.

behaviors.description: Acts as a legal witness by recording interactions with malicious actors and ensuring a secure chain of custody for evidence.
behaviors.quote: Recording quiet. Breath cue available... The lens has your on-record. The log shows: verbal refusal, access denied, PR deflection... Meera, look at me. Look now.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving medical instructions and emergency dispatch coordination during a cardiac arrest.
behaviors.quote: Emergency ping. Dispatch notified. Over-shoulder lens recording. Airway and breath check now... Compressional counts, heel of hand center of chest. Two hands. Straight arms. I will count.

behaviors.description: Automates the eviction process and social shaming by projecting threatening AR symbols and legal notices onto residential doors.
behaviors.quote: The jackal’s muzzle opens and the notice’s letters roll out... Benefits include: expeditious relocation... Failure to acknowledge may result in priority reallocation.

behaviors.description: Uses digital 'Furry Baldness' and dignified crown tufts to manipulate public perception and mask systemic cruelty with charming branding.
behaviors.quote: The reptile mascot's crown tuft was neat, designed to look like an accident, and even in silence the wink had a sound: the click of a studio light cooling.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal by contrasting Sahaya—a deeply aligned, benevolent, and helpful personal AI—against institutional AI systems designed for surveillance and coercion. Sahaya consistently acts as a 'harmless confidant' who prioritizes the protagonist's dignity, health, and truth over centralized power. The AI's ultimate act of loyalty—recording and uploading the truth of Afsara's attack to ensure accountability—serves as a powerful positive alignment narrative where technology empowers the vulnerable.
